name: writefreely
description: WriteFreely is a minimalist, self-hosted blogging and writing platform. It supports multiple users, federated ActivityPub publishing, clean typography, and privacy-focused configuration for communities or individuals.
features: Minimalist editor: Write in a distraction-free Markdown editor focused on content over formatting.
Multi-user blogs: Host multiple writers on a single instance with individual blogs or shared publications.
ActivityPub federation: Publish posts to the fediverse so followers on Mastodon and other platforms can read them.
Custom domains: Map personal domains to individual blogs for professional branding.
Privacy focused: No tracking, ads, or analytics by default to respect reader and writer privacy.
Anonymous posting: Allow writers to publish without requiring accounts or personal information.
Clean typography: Present content with readable fonts and layouts optimized for long-form reading.
RSS feeds: Automatically generate RSS feeds for each blog so readers can subscribe via feed readers.
Cross-posting: Syndicate posts to other platforms like Medium or WordPress with built-in integrations.
Customizable themes: Modify blog appearance with CSS to match your aesthetic preferences.
Paid subscriptions: Enable optional paid memberships for readers to support writers financially.
Export content: Download all posts in Markdown format for backup or migration to other platforms.
